Text: Jihofa gbe̩gbe̩ i laño̩ dʼukpe̩ ku ma je̩nyʼu gbalii ef ewo O̩jo̩-wa!
Oj uwo-wñ kiafo̩ le̩, i jʼatate̩ alifia,
O̩jo̩ dʼo̩la-wñ dufu ñw ma ef unyi-wñ
Todu go, amonu kʼo̩la-ma jeju jo̩, ma kpe̩re̩ lale.
Ma fʼu li, tak awuwu fʼuma mu,
Uwe̩ nʼafu olodudu fʼo̩ko̩ o̩ko̩ Tarshish kpo̩fo̩ rinyo̩.
Alu kʼa gbo̩ le̩, abe̩le̩ a li
Me̩ lule̩ le Zayo̩n daka, me̩ la lʼubi-wñ daka,
me̩ dʼe̩do̩ te̩ ugbo ugbiti-wñ nyo̩nyo̩,
todu O̩jo̩-i chʼO̩jo̩ e-wa tʼogbegbele̩ nyile̩wa;
